title: Gun Shots Interrupt Interview, But The Conversation Just Gets Started
teaser: During a conversation between a reporter and community activists on Chicago's South Side, gunshots not more than 100 feet away shattered an otherwise quiet afternoon. After the initial shock wore off, the neighborhood leaders expressed their frustration over their community's connection with gun violence and engaged in a deep conversation about its underlying causes â€” and what can be done to solve them.
